source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select
[Territory Code],
[Area Code],
[Branch Code],
[Zone Code],
[National Code],
[National Name],
[Region Code],
[Region Name],
[Regional Sales Head Name],
[Branch Name],
[Branch Sales Head Name],
[Zone Name],
[Sales Manager Name],
[Area Name],
[Area Sales Manager Name],
[Territory Name],
[Sales Executive Name],
[Division Name],
[SE Code],
[Channel],
[Business Unit],
